content:
That's awesome to hear! It's great that you're having a blast playing volleyball with your friends from work. Recreational leagues are a fantastic way to stay active, socialize, and have fun with colleagues outside of the office. Your 2-1 record is a great start, and I'm sure you'll continue to improve with practice and teamwork.

Remember to communicate with your teammates, work together on strategy, and support each other on and off the court. Volleyball is a team sport, and having a strong team dynamic can make all the difference in your performance and overall experience.

Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further tips on improving your skills. I'm always here to help. Good luck with your next game on Thursday, and I hope you and your team continue to have a blast playing together!

By the way, what's your team's name? Do you have any fun team traditions or rituals that get you pumped up before games?
